trans-unit.source: Represents an intersection between a ray hit test and a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
This class returns information about the intersection of a ray and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>.

Barycentric coordinates returned by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult.VertexWeight1%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult.VertexWeight2%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult.VertexWeight3%2A> can be interpolated to find the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> where the intersection occurred, or the point on the intersected model's texture using texture coordinates.
Gets the distance between the point of intersection and the ray's origin in the coordinate space of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> which initiated the hit test.

Double that indicates the distance between the point of intersection and the ray's origin in the coordinate space of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> which initiated the hit test.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref> intersected by this hit test.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref> intersected by the ray.
Gets the point at which the mesh was intersected by the ray along which the hit test was performed.
Point3D at which the mesh was intersected.
First vertex of the mesh triangle intersected by the ray.

This property provides the index position of the vertex in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates%2A> collections of the mesh triangle intersected.
The index of the first vertex.
Second vertex of the mesh triangle intersected by the ray.

This property provides the index position of the vertex in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates%2A> collections of the mesh triangle intersected.
The index of the second vertex.
Third vertex of the mesh triangle intersected by the ray.

This property provides the index position of the vertex in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates%2A> collections of the mesh triangle intersected.
The index of the third vertex.
Relative contribution of the first vertex of a mesh triangle to the point at which that triangle was intersected by the hit test, expressed as a value between zero and 1.
This property is the first of the mesh triangle's barycentric coordinates.
The weighting of the first vertex.
Relative contribution of the second vertex of a mesh triangle to the point at which that triangle was intersected by the hit test, expressed as a value between zero and 1.
This property is the second of the mesh triangle's barycentric coordinates.
The weighting of the second vertex.
Relative contribution of the third vertex of a mesh triangle to the point at which that triangle was intersected by the hit test, expressed as a value between zero and 1.
This property is the third of the mesh triangle's barycentric coordinates.
The weighting of the third vertex.
